scripts.db:reset:dev: npx sequelize-cli db:migrate:undo:all --env development && npx sequelize-cli db:migrate --env development && npx sequelize-cli db:seed:all --env development
scripts.db:reset:test: npx sequelize-cli db:migrate:undo:all --env test && npx sequelize-cli db:migrate --env test && npx sequelize-cli db:seed:all --env test
scripts.db:reset:prod: npx sequelize-cli db:migrate:undo:all --env production && npx sequelize-cli db:migrate --env production && npx sequelize-cli db:seed:all --env production
